alert.note: Alert for Cuyahoga; Geauga; Lake (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 19 at 6:58PM EST until January 19 at 7:45PM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Geauga County in northeastern Ohio... Northeastern Cuyahoga County in northeastern Ohio... Lake County in northeastern Ohio... * Until 745 PM EST. * At 656 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Highland Hills, or near Cleveland, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Cleveland, Painesville, Willowick, Chardon, Fairport Harbor, Geneva-On-The-Lake, Euclid, Mentor, Cleveland Heights, Willoughby, Eastlake, Warrensville Heights, Madison, Perry, Highland Hills, Timberlake, Lakeline, Chesterland, Garfield Heights and Shaker Heights. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
